item.title: CiACS4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: orange1.1g037587m Gene Symbol: CiACS4 Gene Name: Citrus ACC synthase 4 Genome: citrus reference genome Species: Citrus limon Functional Descriptions: Citrus ACC synthase CiACS4 regulates plant height by inhibiting gibberellin biosynthesis.

item.title: CmMAF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cluster-17868.118397 Gene Symbol: CmMAF2 Gene Name: AFFECTING FLOWERING 2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Chrysanthemum MAF2 regulates flowering by repressing gibberellin biosynthesis in response to low temperature.

item.title: CsERF061
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsERF061 Gene Name: group I ethylene response factor 61 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Ethylene activation of carotenoid biosynthesis by a novel transcription factor CsERF061.

item.title: CsTT8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs5g31400 Gene Symbol: CsTT8 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsTT8 regulates anthocyanin accumulation in blood orange through alternative splicing transcription.

item.title: LeNCED1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeNCED1 Gene Name: 9-cis-epoxy-carotenoid dioxygenase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Abscisic acid levels in tomato ovaries are regulated by LeNCED1 and SlCYP707A1.

item.title: MdbHLH162
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD09G1233000 Gene Symbol: MdbHLH162 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdbHLH162 connects the gibberellin and jasmonic acid signals to regulate anthocyanin biosynthesis in apple.

item.title: PsPIN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsPIN1 Gene Name: auxin efflux carrier protein PIN1 Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: PsPK2 (the gene for a pea homolog of Arabidopsis PID , a regulator of PIN1 targeting), PsPIN1 (the major gene for a putative auxin efflux carrier) and LE (a gibberellin biosynthesis gene, GA3ox ), and also examined mutual hormonal regulation of these genes, in pea shoot tips, including a number of mutants.

item.title: PsPK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsPK2 Gene Name: Pisum sativum serine/threonine protein kinase2 Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: PsPK2 (the gene for a pea homolog of Arabidopsis PID , a regulator of PIN1 targeting), PsPIN1 (the major gene for a putative auxin efflux carrier) and LE (a gibberellin biosynthesis gene, GA3ox ), and also examined mutual hormonal regulation of these genes, in pea shoot tips, including a number of mutants.
